name: Framework Builder
shortDescription: Create proprietary frameworks and methodologies that position you as a thought leader.
longDescription: The Framework Builder helps you develop and articulate your unique methodology or process. Turn your approach into a branded, teachable framework that differentiates you and establishes intellectual property.

seoMeta.title: Free AI Framework Builder | Create Proprietary Methodologies
seoMeta.description: Develop proprietary frameworks and methodologies that establish thought leadership with our free AI Framework Builder.

landingContent.heroTagline: Turn Your Expertise Into a Proprietary Framework
landingContent.heroSubtitle: Develop a branded methodology that differentiates you, establishes thought leadership, and creates intellectual property.

howItWorks.title: Describe Your Process
howItWorks.description: Explain how you achieve results for clients.

howItWorks.title: Identify Key Steps
howItWorks.description: Break down your approach into phases or stages.

features.title: Naming Suggestions
features.description: Get catchy, memorable names for your framework.

features.title: Step Breakdown
features.description: Clear phases with descriptions and outcomes.

features.title: Teaching Ready
features.description: Designed to be explained and taught to others.

faq.question: How many steps should my framework have?
faq.answer: 3-5 steps is ideal. Enough to show depth, but simple enough to remember. Acronyms (like SMART goals) are powerful.

faq.question: How do I name my framework?
faq.answer: Use an acronym, alliteration, or metaphor. 'The 5C Framework' or 'The Success Ladder' are memorable and ownable.

faq.question: Can I trademark my framework?
faq.answer: Yes, unique framework names can be trademarked. Consult a trademark attorney for specific guidance.

faq.question: How do I use my framework?
faq.answer: Reference it in sales conversations, structure programs around it, and teach it in content. It becomes your signature approach.
